command.text:
select "TblAppointments"."IDATUTO" "IDATUTO" ,"TblAppointments"."HomePhone" "HomePhone" ,"TblAppointments"."branch" "branch" ,"Thebranch"."Desc1" "ThebranchDesc1" ,"TblAppointments"."CallDepid" "CallDepid" ,"CallDep"."CallDepDesc" "CallDepCallDepDesc" ,"TblAppointments"."MobilePhone" "MobilePhone" ,"TblAppointments"."Date" "Date" ,"TblAppointments"."DayID" "DayID" ,"Day"."اليوم" "Dayاليوم" ,"TblAppointments"."Time" "Time" ,"Time"."timedesc" "Timetimedesc" ,"TblAppointments"."MDID" "MDID" ,"MD"."MD_Name" "MDMD_Name" ,"MD"."usercodename" "usercodename" ,"TblAppointments"."Customer_Name" "Customer_Name" ,"TblAppointments"."Ref_Name" "Ref_Name" ,"TblAppointments"."Ref_KindID" "Ref_KindID" ,"Ref_Kind"."Ref_Kind" "Ref_KindRef_Kind" ,"TblAppointments"."Ref_Phone" "Ref_Phone" ,"TblAppointments"."RegionID" "RegionID" ,"Region"."Region" "RegionRegion" ,"TblAppointments"."Full_DetailsAddress" "Full_DetailsAddress" ,"TblAppointments"."Fixed_Date" "Fixed_Date" ,"TblAppointments"."Tele_Mark_SecID" "Tele_Mark_SecID" ,"Tele_Mark_Sec"."Tele_Mark_Sec" "Tele_Mark_SecTele_Mark_Sec" ,"Tele_Mark_SecCallDep"."CallDepDesc" "Tele_Mark_SecCallDepCallDepDesc" ,"TblAppointments"."Customer_onCall" "Customer_onCall" ,"TblAppointments"."ResultID" "ResultID" ,"Result"."ResultDesc" "ResultResultDesc" ,"ResultRef_Kind"."Ref_Kind" "ResultRef_KindRef_Kind" ,"Resultcalss"."calssResultClass" "ResultcalsscalssResultClass" ,"TblAppointments"."DealerID" "DealerID" ,"Dealer"."Dealer_name" "DealerDealer_name" ,"DealerMD"."MD_Name" "DealerMDMD_Name" ,"TblAppointments"."Names_No" "Names_No" ,"TblAppointments"."enter_usre" "enter_usre" ,"TblAppointments"."old_Names" "old_Names" ,"TblAppointments"."Postponement_Cause" "Postponement_Cause" ,"TblAppointments"."Dealer_Remarks" "Dealer_Remarks" ,"TblAppointments"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"TblAppointments"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"TblAppointments"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"TblAppointments"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" ,"TblAppointments"."contactagainb4" "contactagainb4" ,"TblAppointments"."NameID" "NameID" ,"TblAppointments"."insale" "insale" ,"Tele_Mark_Sec"."usercodename" "callusername"
,"TblAppointments"."IDserv" "IDserv" ,"TblAppointments"."Quantity" "Quantity" ,"TblAppointments"."price" "price"
from "dbo"."TblAppointments" "TblAppointments" LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.vcaller ON TblAppointments.DealerID = dbo.vcaller.DealerID LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "TblAppointments"."branch" = "Thebranch"."branch" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."CallDeplist" "CallDep" on "TblAppointments"."CallDepid" = "CallDep"."CallDepid" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Day" "Day" on "TblAppointments"."DayID" = "Day"."DayID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Time" "Time" on "TblAppointments"."Time" = "Time"."الوقت" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_MD" "MD" on "TblAppointments"."MDID" = "MD"."MDID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Ref_Kindlist" "Ref_Kind" on "TblAppointments"."Ref_KindID" = "Ref_Kind"."Ref_KindID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Regions" "Region" on "TblAppointments"."RegionID" = "Region"."RegionID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Tele_Mark_Sec" "Tele_Mark_Sec" on "TblAppointments"."Tele_Mark_SecID" = "Tele_Mark_Sec"."Tele_Mark_SecID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."CallDeplist" "Tele_Mark_SecCallDep" on "Tele_Mark_Sec"."CallDepid" = "Tele_Mark_SecCallDep"."CallDepid" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Results" "Result" on "TblAppointments"."ResultID" = "Result"."ResultID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Ref_Kindlist" "ResultRef_Kind" on "Result"."Ref_KindID" = "ResultRef_Kind"."Ref_KindID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_ResultsClassfication" "Resultcalss" on "Result"."calssid" = "Resultcalss"."calssid" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_Dealers" "Dealer" on "TblAppointments"."DealerID" = "Dealer"."DealerID" LEFT OUTER join "dbo"."Tbl_MD" "DealerMD" on "Dealer"."MDID" = "DealerMD"."MDID"

field.name: Tele_Mark_SecCallDepCallDepDesc
field.label: Tele Mark Sec Call Dep Desc

field.name: phonesearch
field.label: phonesearch
field.formula: CAST(TblAppointments.HomePhone AS nvarchar(9)) + N' | ' + CAST(ISNULL(TblAppointments.MobilePhone, 0) AS nvarchar(9))

action.data: update DirectSalesContactList set callResultID=1 ,recalldate=@Parameters_Date where NameID=@NameID
